about_the_game:
Product Features and Highlights:

  • Support Windows 10 64-bit and above.

  • Enables easy space creation through drag-and-drop functionality.

  • Provides simple camera control mechanics using W, A, S, D.

  • Introduces a new presentation tool tailored for 3D spaces.

A vibrant XR production experience for everyone

The magic of virtual world in real time

Experience true immersion with high-quality real-time rendering powered by a game engine! XROOM's technology enhances immersion with photorealistic graphics. 

Intuitive, fast, and infinitely playable

Storytelling with the freedom of a virtual space studio, saving up to 90% of the time and cost of conventional XR content creation.

Flexible media compositing, a variety of 3D templates

The MediaPlane feature enables free media compositing through 2D images, 3D asset sources, and videos, and enables content creation through simple equipment connectivity, from mobile phones to professional filming equipment.

What can you create with XROOM?

  • Entertainment/media content
    YouTube content, podcast, event, and cultural performance

  • XR experiential education content
    XR experiential education for kids, XR production training

  • Branded promotional content
    campaign, showcase, live commerce

XROOM Solutions and Business Enquiries

 👉 play@soulx.co.kr

Experience true immersion with high-quality real-time rendering powered by a game engine! XROOM's technology enhances immersion with photorealistic graphics.

The MediaPlane feature enables free media compositing through 2D images, 3D asset sources, and videos, and enables content creation through simple equipment connectivity, from mobile phones to professional filming equipment.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel quad-core recommended
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel or AMD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 12.5 or higher
  • Processor: Intel quad-core or Apple Silicon (M1/M2)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel, AMD, or Apple
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: XROOM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window10 64bit or higher
  • Processor: intel 9th Gen i5 or higher AMD Ryzen™ 2600X or higher
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VGA NVIDIA GTX 3060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window10 64bit or higher
  • Processor: intel 13th Gen i7 AMD Ryzen™ 7 5800X3D
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 4080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: xroom: From 3D and XR content creation to marketing content for brands and products! Create content as easily and enjoyably as playing a game, and share it instantly through live streaming. Discover the ultimate tool for creators to express their freedom and creativity.
